===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|けい}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=けい}} {{m|zh|敬|tr=kjæng<sup>H</sup>||respectful}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|けい}}

====Affix====
{{ja-pos|affix|けい}}

# [[respect]], [[honor]], [[reverence]]

=====Usage notes=====
Used in kanji compounds. Not used in isolation except as a ''suru'' verb.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> See {{ja-l|敬する}}.

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|敬する|けいする}}: to [[respect]], to [[esteem]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|うやまい}}
The {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|敬う|tr=uyamau||to resepect, to esteem}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|うやまい}}

====Alternative forms====

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|うやまい}}

# [[respect]], [[esteem]]

=====Usage notes=====
More commonly spelled as {{ja-l|敬い}} with the [[okurigana]].

===Etymology 3===
Used as [[ateji]] in various names.
